mapper.select: SELECT p_no, subject, content, pwd, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, good_count, id, name, rcount, num FROM (SELECT p_no, subject, content, pwd, regdate, hit, good_count, id, name, rcount, rownum as num FROM (SELECT p_no, subject, content, pwd, regdate, hit, good_count, id, name, rcount FROM pbo_4 WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT p_no, subject, content, pwd, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, good_count, id, name, rcount, num FROM (SELECT p_no, subject, content, pwd, regdate, hit, good_count, id, name, rcount, rownum as num FROM (SELECT p_no, subject, content, pwd, regdate, hit, good_count, id, name, rcount FROM pbo_4 ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE p_no=#{p_no}

SELECT q_no, hit, group_id, isreply, group_step, group_tab, name, subject, content, pwd, id, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, num FROM (SELECT q_no, hit, group_id, isreply, group_step, group_tab, name, subject, content, pwd, regdate, id, rownum as num FROM (seleCT q_no, hit, group_id, isreply, group_step, group_tab, name, subject, content, pwd, regdate, id FROM qbo_4 WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY regdate ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT ord_jjim_4.j_no, ord_jjim_4.id, ord_jjim_4.o_no, ord_4.poster, ord_4.name, ord_4.s_info, ord_4.price FROM ord_jjim_4 LEFT JOIN ord_4 ON ord_jjim_4.o_no = ord_4.o_no WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT jjim_p_4.c_no, jjim_p_4.id, jjim_p_4.no, rcpg_4.poster, rcpg_4.title, rcpg_4.tel FROM rcpg_4 LEFT JOIN jjim_p_4 ON jjim_p_4.c_no = rcpg_4.c_no WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT oi_no,order_date,order_time,msg,state, (SELECT store FROM ord_4 WHERE o_no=ord_info_4.o_no) as store, (SELECT name FROM ord_4 WHERE o_no=ord_info_4.o_no) as name, (SELECT poster FROM ord_4 WHERE o_no=ord_info_4.o_no) as poster, (SELECT price FROM ord_4 WHERE o_no=ord_info_4.o_no) as price FROM ord_info_4 WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY oi_no DESC
